00028 struct FCDFormatHint
00029 {
00030     enum channelValues { CHANNEL_UNKNOWN, CHANNEL_RGB, CHANNEL_RGBA, CHANNEL_L, CHANNEL_LA, CHANNEL_D, CHANNEL_XYZ, CHANNEL_XYZW };
00031     enum rangeValue { RANGE_UNKNOWN, RANGE_SNORM, RANGE_UNORM, RANGE_SINT, RANGE_UINT, RANGE_FLOAT, RANGE_LOW };
00032     enum precisionValue { PRECISION_UNKNOWN, PRECISION_LOW, PRECISION_MID, PRECISION_HIGH };
00033     enum optionValue { OPT_SRGB_GAMMA, OPT_NORMALIZED3, OPT_NORMALIZED4, OPT_COMPRESSABLE };
00034     channelValues channels; 
00035     rangeValue range; 
00036     precisionValue precision; 
00037     fm::vector<optionValue> options; 
00038 };
